description: The Trump administration’s government-wide layoffs are hitting engineers and researchers at agencies in Washington state including the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (PNNL), the Hanford Nuclear Reservation, the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), the Bonneville Power Administration and elsewhere. The cuts are being driven by multiple initiatives, including Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) and executive orders that eliminate efforts associated with clima
title: Trump layoffs hit Pacific Northwest engineers and researchers at PNNL, Hanford cleanup, elsewhere
